org.opensourcedea.dea
Class Variable

java.lang.Object
  org.opensourcedea.dea.Variable
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Variable
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

The Variables of a DEA Problem. This holds all the information relative to the variables of a DEA Problem.

Author:
Hubert.Virtos
See Also:

getVariableTypeName

public java.lang.String getVariableTypeName(int varIndex)
                                     throws java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException
Gets the name of a VariableType for a specific variable. VariableTypes enums have both a name and a description fields (e.g. NON_DISCRETIONARY, "A non-discretionary variable"). This method only provides the name part of the enum (e.g. in this case, NON_DISCRETIONARY).

Parameters:
varIndex - The index of the variable to get the VariableType name of.
Returns:
The VariableType name of the specified variable.
Throws:
java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException

getVariableTypeDescription

public java.lang.String getVariableTypeDescription(int varIndex)
                                            throws java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException
Gets the description of a VariableType for a specific variable. VariableTypes enums have both a name and a description fields (e.g. NON_DISCRETIONARY, "A non-discretionary variable"). This method only provides the description part of the enum (e.g. in this case, "A non-discretionary variable").

Parameters:
varIndex - The index of the variable to get the VariableType description of.
Returns:
The VariableType description of the specified variable.
Throws:
java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException
